name: Hakuoki: Edo Blossoms - Deluxe Bundle
description:
This special bundle includes Hakuoki: Edo Blossoms for Steam and the Deluxe Pack.

Deluxe Pack DLC includes the following contents!
  • Hakuoki: Edo Blossoms "Character Art Collection" Digital Art Book
  • Hakuoki: Edo Blossoms "Event Scene Collection" Digital Art Book
  • PC Wallpapers
  • Mobile Wallpapers
